REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1838 reute d f BC-BUTLER-<BTLR>-TO-BUY 03-31 0049

TEXT.TITLE: BUTLER <BTLR> TO BUY SKYLIGHT MANUFACTURER
TEXT.BODY: Butler Mfg Co said it signed a memorandum of intent to acquire Naturalite Inc, a manufacturer of skylights. It said Garland, Texas-based Naturalite had sales in 1986 of about 20 mln dlrs. Terms were not disclosed. Reuter
